To also determine pharmacokinetics two different concentration intranasal naloxone finally , determine safety intranasal naloxone respect nasal irritation .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Evaluation Intranasal Intramuscular Naloxone Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Be able provide write consent Must BMI range 18 30kg/m2 , inclusive Must adequate venous access Must clinically significant concurrent medical condition determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram . Must agree use reliable doublebarrier method birth control start screen one week complete study . Oral contraceptive prohibit . Must agree ingest alcohol , drink contain xanthine great 500 mg/day ( e.g. , Coca Cola , coffee , tea , etc . ) , grapefruit/grapefruit juice participate strenuous exercise 72 hour prior admission last blood draw study .
